pages.text: To embed a computer, you first need to create an 'OpenComputers Module':$(br)Prepare an OpenComputers(OC) Assembler, put a modular boat, fill in with:

$(li)A Tier 3 CPU$(li)A Tier 3 HDD$(li)A Tier 3 Ram card$(li)A floppy with an OS (such as OpenOS)$(li)A boot EEPROM (such as the Lua bios)$(br)Click assemble and you'll get the 'OpenComputer Module' item!
Finally, right click your boat with the OC Module and voil√†! A boat with a computer inside of it! The computer requires no power to run as it is already quite expensive.
